short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OA Roulette is a fun new way to find websites to source from for online arbitrage, with over 800 sites in the database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OA Roulette is now ASIN Gadget FREE and we've also combined it with RevROI. We've phased out this extension, please download ASIN Gadget.
